title: Thanks Rito

replies.body:
> thank you riot for making sure the players trying get all the fucking bans

Except you've *clearly* admitted to giving up at the twelve minute mark (which clearly indicates you were most certainly *not* "trying"), or was this statement "wait at 12mins to ff" a blatent lie?

*You* break the rules, *you* get punished, same as everyone else (including the feeder you got on your team).

I would also like to take the time to point out that a 20 minute LPQ is *never* used as an initial punishment (except, perhaps, in the most extreme of circumstances). Logically, this is definitely *not* the first time you've AFKed/DCed, nor is it the first time you've been punished for it.

To put it simply, if Riot banned the other person but not you they'd be "enabling" retaliation through toxicity, which is something they are actively trying to avoid (and for good reason).

The right thing to do in this situation would be to play out the game as if it was any other (surrendering at the earliest convenience if that's what your team decides), then reporting the feeder in the post-game lobby. Abandoning your team because someone fed a few kills is most certainly the *wrong* thing to do, you're just making the situation worse.

Dont get me wrong playing bad here and there is fine or being on tilt whatever, but running down my lane and purposely feeding someone kills to spite another player then the player that did things right gets banned like TY and ILY u scumbag

> if people are duo and they all report you when u did most likely nothing much at all, ur gonna get a 20min timer, or chat restrictions, because they all reported you.

This is simply not true. The system is easily able to identify pre-mades and "adjust" their reports accordingly. Basically, even if a pre-made of 4 were to report you, it would effectively count as only one report. This prevents *exactly* that kind of abuse of the system.

It seems pretty clear to me that you have been rightfully banned in these situations, considering you've just admitted to retaliating in kind to such players: "for *retaliating* to someones toxic mouth... starts shit talking me, and *i reply back*"

 thats 100% wrong i got reported once by a 4 man pre-made, and they were all toxic towards me, they all report me and i got a instant chat restriction? when clearly they were being more toxic then i was, and if it counted as 1 person i woulda have gotten aa chat restriction

>  when clearly they were being more toxic then i was

It doesn't matter who was more toxic than who. If you demonstrated negative behaviour, and you were reported, then you will face appropriate punishment. Sometimes one report is all it takes, it depends on the severity. Any history of negativity is also taken into account, if you have been accurately reported before, then even if that behaviour was not significant enough to net you an immediate punishment, it would be counting against you here.

Your behaviour was deemed negative enough by the system to warrant a chat restriction. That is true regardless of the behaviour of the rest of your team. Defending yourself is not the same as retaliation. If you demonstrate behaviour the community deems unacceptable you will be punished for it, regardless of the origin.
